医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
GPT-4 提高临床试验筛选准确性并降低成本研究人员评估了 RECTIFIER 系统，这是一种支持 RAG 的 GPT-4，该系统在筛选临床试验参与者的心力衰竭方面表现出较高的准确性和效率，在某些方面优于传统方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/GPT-4-enhances-clinical-trial-screening-accuracy-and-cuts-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/GPT-4-enhances-clinical-trial-screening-accuracy-and-cuts-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8f8437c-3a37-4dc4-b7d2-c76b95dcf034 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 22:09:00 -0400 GPT-4 enhances clinical trial screening accuracy and cuts costs
研究人员利用生成机器学习研究自闭症的基因-大脑-行为联系研究人员使用基于 3D 传输的形态测量来可视化与 16p11.2 CNV 相关的大脑变化，实现了高预测准确性并推进了自闭症精准医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Researchers-investigate-the-gene-brain-behavior-link-in-autism-using-generative-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Researchers-investigate-the-gene-brain-behavior-link-in-autism-using-generative-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f96ce42e-a683-4d10-a805-b4f5f59a1f9a Tue, 18 Jun 2024 21:46:00 -0400 Researchers investigate the gene-brain-behavior link in autism using generative machine learning
新研究显示血管紧张素受体阻滞剂可降低癫痫风险最近发表在《JAMA Neurology》上的一项研究表明，血管紧张素受体阻滞剂（一类降压药）可以降低患癫痫的风险，尤其是老年人和中风幸存者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Angiotensin-receptor-blockers-found-to-lower-epilepsy-risk-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Angiotensin-receptor-blockers-found-to-lower-epilepsy-risk-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7628c06d-9791-4363-8be7-3980f9dd8e97 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 21:09:00 -0400 Angiotensin receptor blockers found to lower epilepsy risk, new study reveals
研究发现美国与毒品相关的婴儿死亡人数激增《围产期医学杂志》最近的一项研究显示，2018 年至 2022 年间，美国与毒品相关的婴儿死亡人数显着上升，凸显了迫切需要有针对性的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Drug-lated-infant-deaths-surge-in-the-US-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Drug-lated-infant-deaths-surge-in-the-US-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3f465c-f507-422d-aecc-545c322e46ac Tue, 18 Jun 2024 19:58:00 -0400 Drug-related infant deaths surge in the U.S., study finds
荷兰研究证明口服索马鲁肽对 2 型糖尿病和减肥有效荷兰 PIONEER REAL 试验的一项最新研究表明，口服索马鲁肽可有效控制 2 型糖尿病并支持成人减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Oral-semaglutide-proves- effective-for-type-2-diabetes-and-weight-loss-in-Dutch-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Oral-semaglutide-proves- effective-for-type-2-diabetes-and-weight-loss-in-Dutch-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16a02e55-f4ca-4ddd-b9a3-d7f4a9e7e571 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 19:43:00 -0400 Oral semaglutide proves effective for type 2 diabetes and weight loss in Dutch study
研究：戊型肝炎病毒可能通过性传播并与男性不育有关一项新的研究表明，发现戊型肝炎病毒与猪的精子有关，表明该病毒可能通过性传播并与男性不育有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Hepatitis-E-virus-may-be-both- Sexly-transmissed-and-linked-to-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Hepatitis-E-virus-may-be-both- Sexly-transmissed-and-linked-to-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63d1b3d8-2322-4485-a911-bf6335c4cd13 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:55:00 -0400 Study: Hepatitis E virus may be both sexually transmitted and linked to male infertility
血液测试可识别额颞叶痴呆、ALS 和 PSP 的特定病理在一项针对 991 名成年人的研究中，DZNE 的科学家表明，最常见的额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 以及神经系统疾病肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 和进行性核上性麻痹 (PSP) 可以通过血液检测来识别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Blood-test-identizes-specific-pathologies-in-frontotemporal-dementia-ALS-and-PSP.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Blood-test-identizes-specific-pathologies-in-frontotemporal-dementia-ALS-and-PSP.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1487535f-02a9-408c-a987-b976ebc3bed4 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:49:43 -0400 Blood test identifies specific pathologies in frontotemporal dementia, ALS, and PSP
世界卫生组织肾肿瘤新分类整合了分子诊断肾肿瘤病理学已经发生了很大的变化，从两种主要类型的肾恶性肿瘤扩展到 20 多种不同的类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-WHO-classification-of-kidney-tumors-integrates-molecular-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-WHO-classification-of-kidney-tumors-integrates-molecular-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a06f1db9-cc69-48d1-a7f9-8d386e25449e Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:38:26 -0400 New WHO classification of kidney tumors integrates molecular diagnostics
跨学科团队揭示牙龈卟啉单胞菌如何干扰化疗诱导的线粒体自噬MUSC Hollings 癌症中心跨学科团队的一篇新论文描述了细菌牙龈卟啉单胞菌如何干扰化疗诱导的线粒体自噬，使口腔癌肿瘤对药物的作用产生抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Intersubject-team-reveals-how-Porphyromonas-gingivalis-interferes-with-chemotherapy-induced-mitophagy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Intersubjective-team-reveals-how-Porphyromonas-gingivalis-interferes-with-chemotherapy-induced-mitophagy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba135a34-1e2c-43b5-b534-2c3ea227d77d Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:35:42 -0400 Interdisciplinary team reveals how Porphyromonas gingivalis interferes with chemotherapy-induced mitophagy
Future Labs Live 吸引了来自科学界、学术界、初创企业、FMGC、化学和农业行业的专家和领导者来到瑞士巴塞尔的会议厅会议将涵盖从数字化转型到连接与协作、实验室运营与效率等主题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Future-Labs-Live-draws-experts-and-leaders-from-science-academia-start-ups-FMGC-chemical-and-agriculture-industries-前往瑞士巴塞尔会议楼层.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Future-Labs-Live-draws-experts-and-leaders-from-science-academia-start-ups-FMGC-chemical-and-agriculture-industries-前往瑞士巴塞尔会议楼层.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79135f58-7024-49d5-b7ab-7382adf26a40 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 11:57:00 -0400 Future Labs Live draws experts and leaders from science, academia, start-ups, FMGC, chemical, and agricultural industries to its conference floor in Basel, Switzerland
